title: Where Animals Live
description: Where Animals Live presents various animals and the places in which they live. The text and illustrations provide a way to introduce early readers to the concept of habitats.
meta: burrow, octopus, pond, prairie dog, whale, woodchuck
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and supporting details
Blend Sounds : Blend sounds in words heard orally
Consonant Blends : Identify words with r-family blends
Capitalization and Punctuation : Apply sentence punctuation

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
